description: This file defines API endpoints related to user management using FastAPI. It sets up routes for listing, creating, and deleting users, employing role-based access control with dependencies and security policies.

methods.name: list_users
methods.description: Handles GET requests to return a minimal list of users, requiring roles in READ_ROLES.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a user, echoing back the payload, requiring roles in WRITE_ROLES.

methods.name: delete_user
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a user by ID, requiring roles in ADMIN_ROLES.
